S.FORM: Lavoy Allen (Hulam a sulit: ) nalecuhan i Trenton, New Jersey. Lavoy Allen unu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput. Lavoy Allen i 2011 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 50, namapili' tu nu Philadelphia 76ers putiput. 2 bulad 4 demiad, 1989 a mihca, Lavoy Allen, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
